dmca.title: DMCA Complaint Against Your Customer JonHost.com
dmca.body:
Date: June 08, 2005
Attn: Abuse Dept, ThePlanet.com
Pages Sent:  One


WHIR Contact:  Dale Collinge    dale@thewhir.com

Original copyrighted material belonging to theWHIR.com is being displayed on 
JonHost.com without our permission.  

Their IP# is  69.93.10.18 which is owned by ThePlanet.com

Article Displayed Without Our Permission On JonHost.com:
http://www.jonhost.com/hosting.php

Corresponding URL on theWHIR.com:
http://www.thewhir.com//find/web-hosts/articles/intro_to_web_hosting.cfm

Background Information
We have contacted JonHost.com  but they have not responded to the emails and have not removed the offending portion of the article.  The first paragraph of the article on JonHost.com is a direct, verbatim copy of the first two paragraphs in our original article.

DMCA Complaint Statement From theWHIR.com
We hereby state that the complaining party (ourselves, theWHIR.com) has a good faith belief that the use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner (theWHIR.com), it's agent, or the law.

We hereby state that the information in this notification is accurate, and under penalty of perjury, that the complaining party (ourselves, theWHIR.com) is authorized to act on behalf of the owner (theWHIR.com) of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

The article was written by our staff writers, and we do not allow the posting of any of our articles on other websites in full and without permission, even if we were to be credited as the author.

We request that the article be removed, as soon as possible, until JonHost can revise the article and ensure that it is no longer a verbatim copy of our original.

Allison Heather  (Director, Web Hosting Industry Review, Inc.)
87 River Street, Toronto, ON  M5A 3P4  Canada
aheather@thewhir.com
